Articles.Content:
That is at once awesome and terrifying. I do not know what use you will have for a ship that is at least 850 tons, if not closer to 1000, though it is certainly impressive.

DO NOT QUESTION US! It makes all the other ships look smaller by comparison.

Been building a supercarrier; She's 1100 tons, 955 parts, 50 m long, can carry 65000 units of Liquid fuel and 70 Kerbals. She also features a full length hanger/flight deck. Not quite finished yet but space worthy:

http://imgur.com/a/C3J2h

That ship made my battlecruiser look like a frigate. Very cool!
Carrier? Can't they only have so much heavy armour?

DO NOT QUESTION US! It makes all the other ships look smaller by comparison.

'Murica!'

'Brings out old project'

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Also, A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR EVERYONE!

I haven't opened this warship for a few versions, so it's up to you guys to modernize it. I present the infamously hard to destroy UNSC Destroyer, now available for anyone to upgrade.

Heck, I want someone to upgrade this ship and use it in a space battle! Mr. Tegu knows how hard the old destroyer was, and this version is the latest evolution.

You have to select the forward facing control pod in the upper turret to control here to correct orientation.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hgv0f7ky50k0asc/UNSC%20Sky%20Breaker%20MKII%20CA.craft?dl=0

The ship used to be equipped with VTOL Kraken Drives. I removed them for this upload.

I'm going to need to recreate that AGM-65 in order to counter my new vehicles. The M177 is a tough b%$tard.

I guess solid boosts in terminal strikes are required to counter the new armored weapons. Time to create a new loading and firing mechanism for the artillery cannon.

During weapons testing, I figured out that the SRMs on my ships are devestating on my own ships, but my standard missiles dont do a lot of damage to my own ships. So my ships can withstand the attack of my missiles, but are weak against SRMs.... Confusing.

Speaking of confusing, here is a question. What if you travel in time and kill your grandfather before he meets your grandmother?

Merry Christmas, ya'll. I've been working on my new ships, but also making a few combat-grade SSTOs and aircraft to refine my skills with the .90 editor tools.

Hopefully my new Heavy Destroyer, Dreadnought(s), and other in-vacuum-combat ships are done by New Year's!

Merry Christmas everyone! I have some new space ships to share!

Yeah, mine is done. I added da base

The 'Callidus' is finished! The shell and engines are the same as the ship that it was originally but this version has: More fuel, more D/V, higher TWR, better (and more accurate) missiles and a pair of reversing engines.
Ooooooh. I like
Thanks, it took a while to rebuild.
Well no s**t! I mean, that thing is massive.

The 'Callidus' is finished! The shell and engines are the same as the ship that it was originally but this version has: More fuel, more D/V, higher TWR, better (and more accurate) missiles and a pair of reversing engines.

http://i.imgur.com/BkLMFIw.png

Nice, want to fight me with it? what are the stats?

Also; built a launcher for the Supercarrier and finished tidying up the engine clusters:
